title: Tusshar Kapoor shares son Laksshya's throwback video and it's adorable enough to melt your heart! | Zee News
text:
Tusshar Kapoor shares son Laksshya's throwback video and it's adorable enough to melt your heart! By Raghav Jaitly | Last Updated: Monday, February 20, 2017 - 14:57 0 Follow @ZeeNews 
New Delhi: After Shahid Kapoor's daughter Misha Kapoor and Kareena Kapoor Khan's son Taimur Ali Khan Pataudi, now Tusshar Kapoor's little munchkin Laksshya Kapoor has become the latest social media sensation. On Sunday, the 'Kyaa Kool Hai Hum' star posted an adorable video on Instagram. 
In the short clip, Laksshya can be seen rolling on the bed on his own for the very first time. "#throwback to that moment when he took his first turn! #myboyisgrowingup #laksshyakapoor #peekaboo," Tusshar captioned the video. 
Watch for yourself: A post shared by Tusshar (@tusshark89) on Feb 18, 2017 at 10:01pm PST 
In June 2016, Tusshar Kapoor, who is single, announced the arrival of his son. The baby was born through IVF and surrogacy. He was named Laksshya. First Published: Monday, February 20, 2017 - 14:57 More from zeenews
